record.dc:title: 74BT2, 15BT2, Butler County, Kentucky. Annis Mound. Feature #51, Sub-Primary mound structure.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: A view from the north of the same Sub-Primary mound structure shown also in Photos 72, 73, 75. Here the outer, or north, line of postmolds runs through the center foreground. Moore's pit lies behind the second pillar from the left. In the rear is the Green River frozen to a depth of nearly 20 inches. View from north. See also photos 72, 73, 75.
